alert.note: Alert for Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains above 11000 Ft; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Above 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 15 at 6:43PM MDT until March 17 at 3:00AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM MDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 2 feet. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Sangre de Cristo Mountains Above 11000 Feet. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 3 AM MDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact travel over mountain passes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains above 11000 Ft; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Above 11000 Ft
